attributes.action: Stop all 5G activity immediately until a yes/no UK referendum can take place
attributes.additional_details:
There is a lot of unease surrounding the use of 5G technology in the UK.

A legally-binding yes/no referendum on 5G would trigger the debate and analysis needed to understand why 5G is needed (indeed if it even is) and whether or not the technology poses a threat to public health.

All major (i.e. televised/live streamed) debates on this topic must feature a relevant and reputable scientist, a representative for the telecommunications industry and political leaders.
attributes.background:
Stop the UK 5G rollout and deactivate all existing 5G equipment immediately, until a public referendum is held with the question:

‘Should 5G be permitted in the UK? Yes or no?’

rejection.details:
You might like to sign this petition calling for an independent investigation into 5G safety:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/312997
